readAloudInstruction.message: The text can be read on request

marginAlignInstruction.message: To dock playback to the left

clickFaciliteInstruction.message: To avoid scoring errors and save effort

cursorAspectInstruction.message: To change the rendering of cursors

focusAspectInstruction.message: To change the way the focus is rendered on the page

colorContrastInstruction.message: To change the background and text colours

linksStyleInstruction.message: To change the colour of the navigation links

stopAnimationsInstruction.message: To prevent animations within the page

scrollInstruction.message: To make it easier to move up and down the page

chooseModeAndValidate.message: Choose a usage mode and confirm :

visionPlusDescription.message: Designed for people with impaired vision. The text and page colours are high contrast, the mouse and focus are clearly visible, and a magnifying glass and reading ruler are available.

visionPlusPlusDescription.message: User mode designed for people with severe visual impairments. Text and page colours are modified, elements (focus, mouse, text, scrollbar) are much larger, an optimised font, a ×5 magnifier and a reading ruler are available.

facilePlusDescription.message: User mode designed for people who are unfamiliar with the Internet. Text, buttons, links, mouse and focus are clearly visible and slightly larger, contrasts are adjusted and a magnifying glass is available..

dysPlusDescription.message: A user guide for people with reading or writing difficulties. A font optimised for dyslexia, airy, left-aligned text, a reading ruler, the option of colouring the sound characters and having the text read to you.

moteurPlusDescription.message: User mode designed for people with motor impairments. Easy keyboard navigation, a clearly visible focus, a palette of virtual buttons.

pointagePlusDescription.message: Use mode designed for people who have difficulty pointing with the mouse. A mouse that is clearly visible and of a good size, enlarged click zones and the ability to click effortlessly on hover, a lift with large buttons.

langueDesSignesDescription.message: User guide for people who express themselves mainly in sign language. LSF thumbnails on complex words, a link to the Signs@Work dictionary and an interface with video instructions. A mouse that is clearly visible and of a good size, enlarged click zones and the ability to click effortlessly on hover, a lift with large buttons.

audioPlusDescription.message: User guide for people with hearing difficulties. Visual equivalents to audio signals, systematic subtitling.

calmeDescription.message: User mode designed for hypersensitive people. Pleasant colours and transitions, no animations or interruptions.
